hero.title: Master Craftsmen of Wood
hero.subtitle: Professional carpentry services combining traditional craftsmanship with modern techniques. From custom woodwork to fine finishing, we build with the strength of oak.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From custom decks to hurricane protection, we bring your vision to life with expert craftsmanship and attention to detail.
services.finishCarpentryDesc: Precision trim work, crown molding, baseboards, and detailed woodwork that adds elegance to any space.
services.outdoorLivingDesc: Custom decks, pergolas, and outdoor structures designed for Florida's climate and your lifestyle.
services.hurricaneProtectionDesc: Code-compliant hurricane shutters and impact-resistant installations to protect your home.
services.repairRestorationDesc: Expert restoration of historic homes and expert repair of existing woodwork and structures.

about.title: About Original Oak Carpentry
about.subtitle: Combining traditional craftsmanship with modern techniques
about.description: At Original Oak Carpentry, we honor the timeless tradition of craftsmanship while embracing modern innovation. Our name reflects our commitment to building with the strength and durability of oak, creating pieces that stand the test of time with precision and purpose.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional carpentry services that blend traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design, creating lasting value for our clients and community.
about.craftsmanshipText: Every project reflects our dedication to precision and quality.
about.innovationText: We combine traditional techniques with modern tools and methods.
about.integrityText: Honest communication and transparent pricing in all our dealings.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: See the quality and craftsmanship in our recent projects

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.
contact.name: Name
contact.quoteDesc: Tell us about your project and we'll provide a detailed quote.
